snippet: Both Madison Square Garden and Barclays Center have applied to host the 2015 N.B.A. game. No other cities are under consideration, making it a near certainty that New York will host the game.
abstract: Madison Square Garden and Barclays Center have applied to host the 2015 NBA All-Star Game; no other cities are under consideration, making it a near certainty that New York will host the game.
